Name: Alexandra's
Notes: Their guava poptarts are really good

Name: Hood Famous
Notes: Highly recommend the iced lilikoi matcha.

Name: Fuji Bakery
Notes: Super friendly staff, amazing pastries. Small menu up front lists things that aren't in the window. Matcha lattes are a little too sweet.

Name: Zeitgeist
Notes: Lots of open space. Can usually find a table.
